description: Erection of hip to gable and rear dormer roof extension with Juliet balcony. Erection of a new front porch.
decision_conditions: The erection of a hip to gable and rear dormer roof extension with Juliet balcony and the erection of a new front porch falls within the parameters of permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class B and D  of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

Please note that the quality of advice will be proportionate to the level of information provided, therefore it is to the applicants benefit to provide as much supporting information as possible for the proposal. eg: plans and elevations, photographs and supporting documents.
